titleStmt.title: Anno III. & IIII. Edvvardi sexti. Actes made in the session of this present parlament, holden vpon prorogation at Westminster, the .iiii daie of Nouembre, in the thirde yere of the reigne of our most dread souuereine Lorde Edward the .vi by the grace of God, king of Englande, Fraunce, and Ireland, defendour of the faith, and of the Churche of Englande, and also of Irelande, in earth the supreme head: and there continued, and kept to the first daie of Februarie, in the .iiii. yere of the reigne of our saied Souuereine Lorde, as foloweth.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Laws, statutes, etc.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Richard Graston [i.e. R. Tottell], printer to the Kynges Maiestie.,

notesStmt.note: The imprint, from colophon, is false; actual printer's name and publication date conjectured by STC.
Title within ornamental border (Mck. & Ferg. 67), initials.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
